name: UIColor+FlatColors
summary: A category to extend UIColor with the flat colors from the Flat UI framework. http://designmodo.github.io/Flat-UI/
description: `UIColor+FlatColors` is a category that extends `UIColor` with methods to get the colors from the [Flat UI](http://designmodo.github.io/Flat-UI/) framework by [designmodo](http://designmodo.com/).
